metadata.title: Saudi Minister Adel Aljubeir welcomes ceasefire understanding between Pakistan, India

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, May 10 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar Saturday received a call from Saudi Minister of State for Foreign Affairs Adel Aljubeir who welcomed the ceasefire understanding between Pakistan and India. "The DPM appreciated Saudi Arabia's positive and constructive role in promoting peace and security in South Asia," Foreign Office Spokesperson said in a press release.
